name: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies with a golden brown exterior and gooey chocolate centers.
steps: Mix flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl
Cream butter and sugars until fluffy
Drop rounded tablespoons onto baking sheets
Bake for 9-11 minutes until golden brown

name: Vegetarian Pasta Primavera
description: A colorful and healthy pasta dish loaded with fresh spring vegetables in a light cream sauce.
steps: Cook pasta according to package directions
Sauté garlic in olive oil until fragrant
Add vegetables and cook until tender

name: Quick Breakfast Smoothie
description: A nutritious and delicious smoothie perfect for busy mornings, packed with fruits and protein.
steps: Add all ingredients to a blender
Add more liquid if too thick
Pour into a glass and enjoy immediately

name: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Herb Butter
description: Perfectly grilled salmon fillet topped with a fragrant lemon herb butter sauce.
steps: Brush salmon with olive oil and season with salt and pepper
Mix butter with herbs, lemon zest, and lemon juice
Grill salmon skin-side down for 4-5 minutes
Flip and grill for 3-4 minutes more
Top with herb butter and serve

name: Classic Caesar Salad
description: A timeless Caesar salad with crisp romaine, homemade croutons, and authentic dressing.
steps: Whisk together garlic, olive oil, lemon juice, mustard, and Worcestershire

name: Beef Tacos with Fresh Salsa
description: Flavorful ground beef tacos topped with homemade fresh salsa and all the fixings.
steps: Brown ground beef in a skillet
Add taco seasoning and water according to package
Top with lettuce, cheese, tomatoes, onions, and cilantro
Serve with lime wedges and sour cream

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
description: Comforting homemade chicken noodle soup with tender chicken, vegetables, and egg noodles.
steps: Simmer chicken in broth with vegetables and herbs
Cook until chicken is tender (about 1 hour)
Add noodles and cook for 8-10 minutes

name: Blueberry Pancakes
description: Fluffy buttermilk pancakes studded with fresh blueberries and served with maple syrup.
steps: Mix dry ingredients in a large bowl
Whisk wet ingredients in another bowl
Cook on hot griddle until bubbles form
Flip and cook until golden brown

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: Quick and healthy vegetable stir fry with a savory sauce, perfect for a light dinner.
steps: Heat vegetable oil in wok or large skillet
Stir fry garlic and ginger until fragrant
Add vegetables and stir fry for 3-4 minutes
Mix soy sauce, sesame oil, and cornstarch with broth

name: Classic Meatloaf
description: Traditional meatloaf with a sweet and tangy glaze, perfect comfort food for family dinner.
steps: Mix all ingredients except glaze ingredients
Shape into loaf in baking dish
Mix brown sugar and ketchup for glaze
Bake for 1 hour or until internal temperature reaches 160°F
Let rest for 10 minutes before slicing

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
description: Layered Greek yogurt parfait with fresh berries, granola, and honey for a healthy breakfast or snack.
steps: Layer half the yogurt in a glass
Add half the granola and berries
Top with nuts and chia seeds

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
steps: Cook pasta according to package directions
Whisk eggs and cheeses in a bowl
Toss hot pasta with egg mixture
Season with pepper and serve immediately

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Individual chocolate cakes with molten chocolate centers, served warm with vanilla ice cream.
steps: Fold in chocolate mixture and flour

name: Quinoa Buddha Bowl
description: Nutritious quinoa bowl loaded with roasted vegetables, avocado, and a tahini dressing.
steps: Roast sweet potato and chickpeas with olive oil
Massage kale with olive oil and salt
Whisk tahini, lemon juice, and maple syrup
Assemble bowls with quinoa, vegetables, and avocado

name: Beef and Broccoli Stir Fry
description: Tender beef strips with crisp broccoli in a savory sauce, served over steamed rice.
steps: Marinate beef with soy sauce and cornstarch
Stir fry beef until browned, remove from pan
Stir fry broccoli, garlic, and ginger
Drizzle with sesame oil and serve over rice

name: Apple Cinnamon Oatmeal
description: Warm and comforting oatmeal with fresh apples, cinnamon, and a touch of maple syrup.
steps: Stir in butter and maple syrup

name: Caprese Salad
description: Simple Italian salad with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and balsamic glaze.
steps: Arrange mozzarella and tomato slices on a plate
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze

name: Chicken Fajitas
description: Sizzling chicken fajitas with colorful bell peppers and onions, served with warm tortillas.
ingredients: Sour cream and salsa for serving
steps: Marinate chicken with lime juice, garlic, and spices
Cook chicken until golden, remove from pan
Serve with sour cream and salsa

name: Lemon Garlic Shrimp
description: Quick and flavorful shrimp cooked with garlic, lemon, and herbs, perfect over pasta or rice.
steps: Heat olive oil and butter in large skillet
Add shrimp and cook for 2-3 minutes per side
Add lemon juice and white wine
Stir in parsley and lemon zest

name: Banana Bread
description: Moist and flavorful banana bread with walnuts, perfect for breakfast or afternoon snack.
steps: Mix mashed bananas and melted butter
Stir in sugar, egg, and vanilla
Cool in pan for 10 minutes before removing

name: Vegetable Curry
description: Aromatic vegetable curry with coconut milk, served over fragrant basmati rice.
steps: Heat oil and sauté onion, garlic, and ginger
Stir in vegetables and cook for 2 minutes

name: Grilled Cheese with Tomato Soup
description: Classic comfort food pairing of crispy grilled cheese sandwich with creamy tomato soup.
steps: Butter bread slices and add cheese
Grill sandwiches until golden and cheese melts
Serve hot soup with grilled cheese

name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
description: Grilled chicken wrapped in a tortilla with Caesar salad ingredients and creamy dressing.
steps: Layer lettuce, chicken, cheese, and tomatoes

name: Berry Crumble
description: Warm berry dessert with a buttery oat crumble topping, served with vanilla ice cream.
steps: Toss berries with sugar and cornstarch
Mix flour, oats, brown sugar, and cinnamon
Cut in cold butter until crumbly

name: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
description: Fresh and healthy quinoa salad with Mediterranean flavors, perfect for lunch or side dish.
steps: Cook quinoa in water, let cool
Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano

name: Beef Burger with Caramelized Onions
description: Juicy beef burger topped with sweet caramelized onions and melted cheese on a toasted bun.
steps: Form beef into 4 patties, season with salt and pepper
Cook onions with butter, olive oil, and sugar until caramelized
Add cheese during last minute of cooking
Assemble burgers with onions and toppings

name: Chocolate Chip Muffins
description: Bakery-style chocolate chip muffins with a tender crumb and sweet chocolate chips throughout.
steps: Mix dry ingredients in large bowl
Whisk wet ingredients in another bowl
Cool in pan for 5 minutes before removing

name: Vegetable Lasagna
description: Layered vegetable lasagna with ricotta cheese, spinach, and marinara sauce.
steps: Cook lasagna noodles according to package
Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil
Mix ricotta, egg, spinach, and seasonings
Layer noodles, ricotta mixture, sauce, and cheese
Let rest for 15 minutes before serving
